biography: Flying Colors is an American supergroup composed of Mike Portnoy, Dave LaRue, Casey McPherson, Neal Morse and Steve Morse.
name: Flying Colors

theaudiodb.biography_en: Flying Colors is an American supergroup composed of Mike Portnoy, Dave LaRue, Casey McPherson, Neal Morse and Steve Morse.
theaudiodb.name: Flying Colors

lastfm.bio_content: Steve Morse: Lead and Rhythm Guitar Casey McPherson: Vocals, Keyboards, Rhythm Guitar Neal Morse: Keyboard, Vocals Dave LaRue: Bass Guitar Mike Portnoy: Drums, Percussion, Vocals Formed by members/former members of bands such as Deep Purple, Dream Theater, Dixie Dregs, Transatlantic, Spock's Beard, and Liquid Tension Experiment in 2011, Flying Colors is releasing their debut album on March 27th, 2012. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
